import React from 'react'; import {Card, Button, Icon,Radio} from 'antd' import './ui.less' class Buttons extends React.Component{ state = { loading: true, size:"default", } handleCloseLoading = () => { this.setState({ loading: false }) } handleChange = (e) => { this.setState({ size: e.target.value }) } render() { return (
小 中 大
) } } export default Buttons;
